parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.38

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mods and Addons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns modDir of the mod that given config class was loaded from.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''configSourceMod''' config

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> config: [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[configSourceMod]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Heli_Transport_04_base_F"); //Returns "heli" </code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[configSourceMod]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Car"); //Returns "A3" </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[configFile]], [[configSourceModList]], [[modParams]]
</value></part></template></root>
